name: Trash (itch) (Tinonb1)
description:
The premise of this game is you are a garbage collecter but you need to collect trash from an old anbandoned trashed house, Trash Manor but upon entering nothing seems how it should. It was made using the pico 8 100 lines of code beginner engine and made in pico 8.

This was made for the untitled game jam #22 which had a theme of trash.

Disclaimer: The game is trash
